message:
Urbandale man sentenced to life in prison after trafficking children
“Human trafficking is a crime that occurs in the shadows,” said US Attorney Marc Krickbaum. “Its victims are amongst the most vulnerable members of society."

data.description: Clark Wesley Betts Jr., 41, of Urbandale, will spend life in prison after he was found guilty of two counts of sex trafficking of a child.
data.title: Urbandale man sentenced to life in prison after trafficking children
